title: Finnish Pulla
ingredients: ['500ml milk', '125ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '200g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '4 eggs, beaten', '1kg plain flour, and more as needed', '125g butter, melted', '1 egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
